backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing player state and providing update functions for stress, scene progression, save spots, and barricaded doors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing fullscreen GameView rendering with referenced files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables plus global rules ensuring full-height layout and dark theme support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting full-height body and root container with hidden overflow for fullscreen rendering.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wrapping GameView in a dark-mode ThemeProvider and full-size container.
frontend/src/game/Audio/audioSettingsSto: Zustand store persisting audio volume and mute settings with setters.
Hook generating a proximity-based tension hum using Web Audio oscillator and gain adjustments.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/DialogueConte: Dialogue context managing queueing, timed display, visibility, and progression of dialogue lines.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/scriptedLines: Static map of predefined enemy dialogue lines.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/gree: AI hook determining idle, patrol, and chase states based on distance and triggering dialogue.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/Gree: Green Hood enemy entity controlling movement, chase behavior, hood state, and orientation.
3D model for the Green Hood with hood, glowing eyes, and revealed-mouth mode with teeth.
frontend/src/game/Gameplay/hoodFallMecha: Implements hood-fall detection logic using camera direction checks and timing, with a config-driven penalty system.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main fullscreen Canvas scene combining world, player controller, scene director, and HUD within a DialogueProvider.
frontend/src/game/Input/useInputMode.ts: Selects touch or keyboard/mouse input and exposes movement, look, and interaction state.
frontend/src/game/Input/useKeyboardMouse: Tracks WASD, mouse movement, and interact keys to produce movement and look deltas.
frontend/src/game/Input/useTouchLook.ts: Generates look deltas from right-side touch dragging with accumulated movement sampling.
frontend/src/game/Player/PlayerControlle: Applies movement and camera rotation based on input and updates the player's world position.
frontend/src/game/Scenes/SceneDirector.t: Triggers scripted dialogue lines based on scene progression, starting with an intro event.
frontend/src/game/State/usePlayerState.t: Manages player state synced with backend actor and provides update helpers like stress or scene changes.
frontend/src/game/World/FacilityWorld.ts: Defines lights, geometry, and environment setup for the facility world, including flickering effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context, loading or creating identities via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player state through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, horror-themed color tokens, base resets, and custom components/utilities like threat text and jagged borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
Renders a mobile interact button that briefly triggers an interact input on touch.
Placeholder component displaying an interaction prompt when provided.
Implements a touch joystick that tracks movement via touch events and updates move input.
frontend/src/ui/Dialogue/DialogueBox.tsx: Displays the current dialogue line in a stylized jagged horror box at the bottom of the screen.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/HudShell.tsx: Composes the main HUD including dialogue, stress display, mobile controls, settings, and overlays.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/StressIndicator.tsx: Shows player stress percentage with a color‑coded bar based on stress level.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/FadeToBlack.tsx: Provides a timed fade‑to‑black overlay that animates opacity when activated.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/HoodVignetteOve: Renders a static hood‑style vignette overlay with multiply blend.
frontend/src/ui/Settings/SettingsPanel.t: Modal settings panel for audio volume and mute controls using shared audio settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, typography, plugins, and component animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the game's theme, requirements, features, architecture, and known issues.
